title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 3.20 - Executive Order No. 20: [Amending Executive Order No. 62 (Section 1.62, supra).]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 3.20 - Executive Order No. 20: [Amending Executive Order No. 62 (Section 1.62, supra).]
State Regulations

Article II of the order embodied in Executive Order Number
sixty-two and dated October thirteen, one thousand nine hundred seventy-two, appointing an Extraordinary Special and Trial Term of the Supreme Court, Bronx

County, is hereby amended to read as follows: II. I do hereby designate the Honorable John
M. Murtagh, a Justice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York, First

Judicial District, to hold the said Extraordinary Special and Trial Term as
hereinbefore appointed and described and among other things to cause to be
drawn according to law a grand jury or grand juries to serve the said

Extraordinary Special and Trial Term of the Supreme Court, and where the
interests of prompt and efficient justice require, to transfer any actions and
proceedings to such other trial terms of the Supreme Court as shall be
designated by the State Administrative Judge for such purpose. Signed: Hugh L. Carey

Dated: November 19, 1975

Notes

3.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
